Uses of Package
pulse.problem.schemes.solvers

  • Packages that use pulse.problem.schemes.solvers 
    Package Description
    pulse.problem.schemes.solvers
    Contains various finite-difference solvers for the different problem statements available.
    pulse.search.direction
    Provides a list of PathSolvers and associated classes, which are used to determine the direction of the minimum of a specific SearchTask using an iterative approach.
    pulse.search.direction.pso  
    pulse.search.linear
    Provides classes that are able to search for the minimum of a scalar function of a vector variable that is unimodal on a specific Segment.
    pulse.tasks
    Introduces the SearchTask, which is the main actor in PULsE, and the TaskManager, a high-level class which among other functions manages loading and executing SearchTasks.
  • Classes in pulse.problem.schemes.solvers used by pulse.problem.schemes.solvers 
    Class Description
    Solver
    A solver interface which provides the capability to use the solve method on a Problem.
    SolverException  
  • Classes in pulse.problem.schemes.solvers used by pulse.search.direction 
    Class Description
    SolverException  
  • Classes in pulse.problem.schemes.solvers used by pulse.search.direction.pso 
    Class Description
    SolverException  
  • Classes in pulse.problem.schemes.solvers used by pulse.search.linear

  • Classes in pulse.problem.schemes.solvers used by pulse.tasks 
    Class Description
    SolverException
